row.Text: The explicit cast to double in the first answer isn't necessary - identifying the constant as 5000.0 (or as 5000d) is sufficient.

How to use the C socket API in C++

I've been having issues getting the C sockets API to work properly in C++. Specifically, although I am including sys/socket.h, I still get compile time errors telling me that AF_INET is not defined. Am I missing something obvious, or could this be related to the fact that I'm doing this coding on z/OS and my problems are much more complicated? ;)

I am searching for course materials for "Firebase Essentials For Android" from Udacity.

<!-- What are you trying to accomplish? (Please include sample data.) -->
Using flask and WT forms i am trying to get the user input in a form and  redirecting user input to another route, there using the input i ran a functions
which will get some dict of data.
I want this data to use in a WT form. Once i saw the data and checked all fine.
i wan to save it as new entry for database. 
Problem: after rending the form this i am not able to process to as post request. 

<!-- Paste the part of the code that shows the problem. (Please indent 4 spaces.) -->

    @app.route('/', method =[POST,GET])
    def home():
        if form_validate() and request.POST:
             redirect(url_for(/edit, value=value) 
        return render_template('input.html')  -- Initial page where getting user input 
      @app.route('/edit', method =[POST,GET])
       def edit(value):
           data= getdata(value)
           if data == 'error':
                return render_template('error.html')
           else:
              form=request.form(data=data)
              return render_template('data.html', form=form
              if form_validate() and request.POST:
                   save ()


<!-- What do you expect the result to be?i 
like to see that once render the form how can i use it submit. 

<!-- What is the actual result you get? (Please include any errors.) -->
i am able to get the forms but once return i am not able to move ahead on the save options
use post html after rending html
